lead_paragraph: Novak Djokovic says he is recovering from an eye infection and hopes to be ready to play for Serbia against Kazakhstan this weekend in the Davis Cup.
snippet: Novak Djokovic says he is recovering from an eye infection and hopes to be ready to play for Serbia against Kazakhstan this weekend in the Davis Cup....

headline.main: Djokovic Hopes to Play in Davis Cup Against Kazakhstan
headline.print_headline: Djokovic Hopes to Play in Davis Cup Against Kazakhstan
